text: Anitta and J Balvin are a dangerous duo, especially in their new music video for “ Downtown. ” The “ Is That for Me ” singer and the Colombian star joined forces again on another track and we have to admit, it ’ s very infectious. The song ’ s racy lyrics and music video feature the 24 - year - old Brazilian singer using her charm to help the 32 - year - old star carry out their plan against fellow casino players. The pair, which also teamed up for Balvin ’ s “ Ginza, ” gave fans at in Las Vegas a special performance of the song at Spotify ’ s ¡ Viva Latino! party before the Latin Grammy Awards.
